name: FestivAndes
detail: Transactional system to meet the needs of a festival organizer, including user administration, reservations, purchases and locations.

name: Paseos Ecologicos
detail: Transactional web application to manage ecological tours promoted by government organization. It includes the handling of inscriptions, calendars and activities.

name: Sistema de Minas
detail: IoT application for the manage of a mine system and, specifically, the control of the different environmental variables (temperature, light, humidity, carbon monoxide) that can affect the internal processes of each level.
tec: Framework Play - Kafka/Zookeeper - Arduino - NodeRed - CassandraBD

name: Tutorial REST
description: REST services tutorial and base architecture
detail: Basic tutorial to teach the implementation of REST services in the context of transactional systems. Includes descriptions of a 4-layer architecture and multiple tests to verify its operation.
